Class GLUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.core.graphics.GLUtils
  • public class GLUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Offers some tools to speed-up certain OpenGL routines.

      • geometryToGL

        public static void geometryToGL​(com.jogamp.opengl.GL3 gl,
                                Geometry geometry,
                                int vbo,
                                int vao)
        Configures vertex buffer and vertex array objects from a Geometry object.
        Parameters:
        gl - is the gl context
        geometry - is the geometry containing the vertex information
        vbo - is the vertex buffer object associated with the vertex data
        vao - is the vertex array object associated with the vertex buffer object

      • setUniformMatrix4fv

        public static void setUniformMatrix4fv​(com.jogamp.opengl.GL3 gl,
                                       int program,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       org.joml.Matrix4f matrix)
        Sets a Matrix4fv uniform in a program to the given value.
        Parameters:
        gl - is the gl context
        program - is the program containing the uniform
        name - is the name of the uniform
        matrix - is the value to set the uniform to

      • normalizeColor

        public static final float[] normalizeColor​(float r,
                                           float g,
                                           float b)
        Maps rgb values from [0,255] to [0,1]
        Parameters:
        r - is the red component
        g - is the green component
        b - is the blue component
        Returns:
        an array containing the normalized rgb components
